description.value:
You gain a major engineering invention, your greatest achievement that defined your engineering career; maybe you worked with the Skysteel Manufactory to make a particularly incredible magitek tool, or with Garlond Ironworks on their G-Warrior Project. Choose a major engineering invention from the options below. Your invention's level is equal to your level.

If your invention is destroyed, you may use the Craft Project activity from Complete Crafting Overhaul to rebuild it over a 6 hour day, without spending any resources. An invention only functions due to your meticulous efforts, and has no market price. If your GM is not using CCO, you instead spend 1 day of downtime and attempt a Crafting check with a standard DC for your level; on a success, you rebuild your invention.
